entry.title: Texas Python Regional Unconference
entry.summary: Just a quick announcement for all the Houston and surrounding area Python lovers out there. There is a Texas Python Regional Unconference being held in a couple weeks (Sept. 15 - 16) at the University of Houston main campus. Registration is free and as simple as adding your name to the â€¦
entry.content: Just a quick announcement for all the Houston and surrounding area Python lovers out there. There is a Texas Python Regional Unconference being held in a couple weeks (Sept. 15 - 16) at the University of Houston main campus. Registration is free and as simple as adding your name to the registration wiki page. I'll be there to talk or hack Django with anyone interested. See you there!
